pages.text:
Hilltop Camp Resort
An Exclusive Private Peaceful Getaway
of Hilltop Christian Fellowship
Full Hookup RV Sites
?
RESERVE ONLINE NOW!
Call
1-850-725-3777
This is NOT a commercial RV park.
This is a Private Church Facility.  A Non-Profit Charitable Entity.
The purpose of this facility is to support the church and its missions.
Part of the missions are helping displaced hurricane victims that have lost their homes.
Part of the missions are to house volunteers that are helping recover the church from the damages created by the hurricane.
Part of the mission is to raise funds to support the church missions, this is done when travelers need a place to stay for a little while and can enjoy our facility.  All funds received go to support the
church and its missions
.
No Commercial profit has ever been made at this Hilltop property.
No profit ever has been made by Hilltop.
Note: The County of Jefferson and its agents have continually interfered with the Church’s efforts to support its missions and the people who need the support the church offers.  This included: Tortuously interfering with a FEMA agreement; Denying that the church is a church; and taxing the property at the highest possible property tax rate;  Interfering with Real estate Relationships, Collaborating on the filing of a improper foreclosure;  Interfering with the church’s Horse hosting activities;  Blocking access to the county facilities; and most recently bullying a homeless family off the church property.  Just to name a few.
So if you are willing to weather this abuse you are welcome to join us at
Hilltop Christian Fellowship
with or without your RV.
On-Site Amenities
Located near I-10 and the Georgia-Florida Parkway
Full hookup RV sites
50/30/20 AMP electric, water, and sewer
Shaded sites
Large pull-thru sites
Gated
Equine friendly (
click here for more information
)
ATV/Dirt Bike areas
100+ acres to explore
Church service onsite
Gallery
Location
We are located in the Florida panhandle, about 30 minutes east of
Tallahassee
and only a few miles south of the
Georgia
border.
A convenient stop for those traveling I-10 or the Florida-Georgia Parkway, or to spend some time and enjoy the area.
Site Types and Rates
All sites have full electric, water, and sewer hookups.
A minimum stay of 3 nights is required. Guests are welcome to check out earlier than the 3-night duration, but the total cost for the reservation will remain as if 3 nights were booked.
Weekly and monthly stays welcome!
Site Type
Nightly Rate
Back-in 50/30/20 AMP
$50
Back-in 30 AMP
$50
Back-in 50 AMP
$50
Pull-Thru 50/30/20 AMP
$50

Click the button below to make a reservation:
Book Online Now
Contact Us

Gallery
Directions:
Address: 4741 Ashville Hwy, Monticello, FL 32344
WARNING:  Some GPS’s, such as Google Maps, might take you on an unwanted back road.
Our entrance is directly off of Ashville highway. Do not follow a GPS away from Ashville highway. If possible, we recommend navigating to our “Hilltop Camp Resort” business pin, and paying attention to visible landmarks.
Click here for detailed directions for approaching, and arriving at, our property.
(Please read them to ensure you don’t accidentally pass our
entrance
.  There aren’t many good places to turn around.)
From I-10 or Florida-Georgia Parkway:
From I-10, take exit 225 to Rt. 19 (Florida-Georgia Parkway) Northbound to Monticello. After reaching Monticello.
At the Monticello traffic circle, take Rt. 90 east.
After 1 mile, turn left on St. Margaret’s Church Rd.
In about 500 feet, at the “T”, turn right on Ashville Hwy.
Click here for detailed
directions for approaching, and arriving at, our property.
